originalText.text: Without doubt one of the best doctors i have ever had ‘ Most trustworthy and excellent doctor. He is thorough, his advice is spot by on, he is concerned. He thoroughly reviews your medical history to remind himself of your individual situation, before he sees you.  Can’t praise him enough.

originalText.text: Dr Neiderman was thorough, addressed all my concerns and put me at ease. His report on the portal was excellent in addressing all my issues. I would recommend him highly.

originalText.text: Dr Niederman is an excellent Pulmonologist. He’s knowledgeable and caring. He’s very thorough and explains test results.

text.text: Dr Niederman is an excellent Pulmonologist. He’s knowledgeable and caring. He’s very thorough and explains test results.

originalText.text: The pulmonary clinic is extremely small compared to the  space on the 12th floor. But the service is wonderful. Dr. Michael S Neiderman is an extremely talented and wonderful pulmonary doctor.  He has patience, understanding and attentive with his patients. He takes his time to understand the best treatment for the person he is taking care of..  I would recommend this doctor to anyone who wants an Excellent Doctor for the Lungs.
